text: The American Diabetes Association (ADA) are a United States nonprofit organization. ADA seek to educate the public on diabetes and anyone affected by it. That includes type 1 diabetes, type 2 diabetes, gestational diabetes, latent autoimmune diabetes and other forms of the disease. The ADA were founded in 1940. ==References== Category:1940 establishments in the United States Category:Medical and health organizations in the United States Category:Diabetes mellitus
title: American Diabetes Association
